          <title>
            <string language="en">Eclipse of the Moon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eklipse des Mondes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éclipse de la lune</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eclipse da lua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eclipse della luna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έκλειψη του φεγγαριού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Eclipse de la luna</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows reflection of Sun's light by the Moon (top) and an eclipse of  the Moon (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eclipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lunar eclipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Reflexion des Lichtes des 
Sonnen durch den Mond (Oberseite) und eine Eklipse des Mondes 
(Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la réflexion de la 
lumière du soleil par la lune (dessus) et une éclipse de la lune 
(bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a reflexão da luz do 
sun pela lua (alto) e por um eclipse da lua (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la riflessione della 
luce del sun dalla luna (parte superiore) e da un'eclipse della luna 
(parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την αντανάκλαση του φωτός
του ήλιου από το φεγγάρι (κορυφή) και μια έκλειψη του φεγγαριού 
(κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la reflexión de la luz
del sun por la luna (tapa) y un eclipse de la luna (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eklipse</string>
          </keyword>
